testcase.name: TestEnvironmentSetup

error.message: Test environment has dependency and configuration issues preventing execution

testcase.error:
Issues discovered during baseline test execution:
1. Bun Test Issues: - Playwright tests being picked up by bun test causing conflicts - Tests timing out (>2 minutes) indicating potential infinite loops or blocking operations - Reporter format issues (limited to junit with --reporter-outfile)
2. Vitest Issues (apps/web): - Missing vite dependency for configuration loading - ERR_MODULE_NOT_FOUND errors during config resolution
3. Test File Conflicts: - E2E tests (*.spec.ts) causing conflicts with unit test runner - Mixed test environments (Playwright vs Bun/Vitest) in same discovery path
4. Dependency Resolution: - Node modules appear incomplete or inconsistent - Workspace dependencies may not be properly installed
Recommendations for Phase 1: - Separate test execution paths for different test types - Fix dependency resolution issues - Configure proper test isolation - Establish working test environment before proceeding with cleanup
